school: Civil Engineering School, Mathematics & Physics School
description: The course introduces fundamental concepts of probability, statistical methods and computer programming strategies to perform data analyses and develop mathematical models for engineering applications. The content comprises probability distributions, sampling methods, hypothesis tests, regression, computer programming, graphing and visualisation, among others.
incompatible: STAT2201 or STAT1201 or STAT1301 or STAT2203 or ENVM2000
